    userName := flag.String("u", "", "The name of the user")
    orgID := flag.String("o", "", "Your organization ID")

    flag.Parse()

    if *userName == "" || *orgID == "" {
        fmt.Println("You must supply the ID of the organization and a user name")
        fmt.Println("-o ORG-ID -u USER-NAME")
        return
    }
